title: Garlic Chutney 😋 |Instant |Side Dish
content:
Side dish: Garlic Chutney 😍 Quantity : 200 gms Duration: 15 mins This chutney looks too spicy 🌶 but it’s not, the color of chutney is so attractive and delicious 😋 because I used Kashmiri dry red chillies they aren’t spicy but gives aromatic flavor and vibrant red color to the dish. Today, I prepared tamilnadu special Side Dish for breakfast such as Plain Dosa, Onion Uttapam 😍, Pullattu, Rice flour dosa and with any variety of idly 😃 especially with curd rice 🍚 aww.. yummy. My suggestion is to try this simple, tasty and famous chutney in south India 🇮🇳 Let’s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Garlic cloves - big size - 5 - Peeled off and chop two halves
  • White onion - 2 medium sized- sliced
  • Kashmiri Dry Red chillies  - 5
  • Tamarind pulp - 1 1/2 Tb sp
  • Salt - 1 tsp
  • Water - 80 ml
  • Oil -   1/2 Tb sp
For tempering :
  • Mustard seeds - 1/4 tsp
  • Cumin seeds - 1/2 tsp
  • Oil - 1 Tb sp
Procedure:
  • Heat a skillet pan over medium heat
  • Add 1/2 Tb sp oil, garlic cloves, red chillies, sauté a minute
  • Then add sliced onions, sauté 3 minutes or till they become light brown color
  • Turn off heat and let it become cool down
  • Add in mixer along with water, tamarind pulp and salt
  • Then make tempering and add grounded paste in, stir continuously 5 minutes or till raw smell goes off
  • Serve with any dosa varieties/ idly varieties or rice 🍚
  • Happy cooking and have a wonderful day ❄️😃
